title: Best of The Herd for Jan 06, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Jan 06, 2020
description:
Colin explains why he thinks the Cowboys settled for Mike McCarthy as their next head coach. FOX NFL Insider Jay Glazer tells Colin why Jerry Jones decided to hire him as well as what will teams like the Browns and Giants do now that McCarthy is off the market. Colin doesn't understand why Russell Wilson continues to get no credit for winning with no help. Plus, he admits where he was right and wrong over the weekend including a total swing and miss on predicting all four playoff games.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
